description: Give your dog the ultimate winter comfort and protection with our Winter Coat Fitting service. At PawCare Studio, we provide custom coat fittings tailored to your dog's size and breed. Each coat is carefully designed to ensure warmth, comfort, and freedom of movement. Our team will also guide you on layering options and winter outfit combinations, helping to prevent cold-related discomfort and keeping your furry friend cozy during outdoor walks and indoor rest. This service ensures your dog stays stylish, protected, and healthy throughout the winter season.
additionalNotes: Please bring your dog in comfortable clothes.

description: Our Winter Grooming Treatment is designed to keep your pet's coat and skin healthy during the cold months. We use moisturizing paw balms, winter-safe shampoos, and gentle conditioning treatments to prevent dryness, itching, and coat damage. Optional nail trimming, ear cleaning, and fur trimming are included to ensure full winter preparedness. Our experienced groomers provide tips on home care and winter grooming routines, making sure your pet stays comfortable, healthy, and happy, even in extreme winter conditions.

Keep your pet warm and safe during freezing winter nights with our Heated Pet Bed Rental. Each bed is temperature-controlled and sanitized for maximum comfort and hygiene. Perfect for pets who are sensitive to cold or spend time outdoors, this service ensures they have a cozy place to rest. Optional blankets and cleaning services after each rental guarantee a clean and warm sleeping environment. Our team will also advise on proper placement and use to ensure your pet remains healthy, comfortable, and stress-free throughout the winter season.

Provide your senior pets with relief from joint pain and arthritis symptoms during cold weather through our specialized therapy sessions. HappyTail Medical Spa offers therapeutic massages, heat therapy, and gentle exercises tailored for senior pets. Our trained therapists evaluate your pet's needs, consult their medical history, and design a therapy plan that improves mobility, reduces stiffness, and enhances comfort. This premium service ensures older pets maintain a good quality of life even during the harshest winter months, with personalized care and attention to their health and wellbeing.

Boost your pet’s immunity and energy during the winter season with a customized Nutritional Winter Diet Plan. HealthyTail Nutrition provides a detailed assessment of your pet's current diet, weight, and health status to create a meal plan tailored to their specific needs. This plan includes winter-friendly foods, immunity-boosting nutrients, and guidance for portion control and supplementation. Follow-up consultations ensure your pet maintains optimal health and energy levels throughout the season. Ideal for pets of all ages, this service promotes overall wellness and vitality during colder months.
requiredItems: Current diet details, pet weight info

description: Help your pets recover from cold, flu, or mild respiratory infections with professional treatment at PawHealers Center. Our expert veterinary team provides diagnosis, medication if necessary, and supportive care to alleviate symptoms and speed recovery. We also advise on at-home care, hydration, and diet to strengthen your pet’s immune system. This service ensures pets remain comfortable, healthy, and safe during winter illnesses, minimizing complications and improving overall wellness.

Keep your pets active, safe, and warm with our Warm Pet Walking Service. HappyPaws Walkers provide professional walking with full winter gear, ensuring your pet enjoys outdoor activity without exposure to cold risks. Walkers are trained to handle extreme winter conditions and will monitor your pet’s health and safety throughout the walk. Leashes, winter coats, and safety equipment are required, and our team offers guidance on outdoor winter exercise routines. This service is ideal for maintaining fitness, mobility, and happiness in your pet during winter.
additionalNotes: Walkers are trained for extreme winter conditions.

description: Ensure your pet’s health is fully protected this winter with our comprehensive Winter Vaccination & Checkup. ArcticVet Clinic provides seasonal vaccines, health assessments, and preventive care tailored to pets of all ages. Our veterinarians check vital signs, organ health, and immunity status to detect potential issues early. Follow-up boosters and care instructions are provided as needed, ensuring your pet remains strong, healthy, and safe throughout the cold season. This service promotes long-term wellness and prevents winter-related illnesses.

Capture the magic of your pet’s winter moments with professional photography from SnowyLens Studio. Our sessions include both indoor and outdoor settings, with winter-themed props and accessories provided. Pets can bring their favorite toys or costumes for a personalized experience. Our photographers specialize in creating vibrant, heartwarming images that showcase your pet’s personality and winter spirit. Each session is designed to make pets comfortable while producing stunning photos you’ll treasure forever.
additionalNotes: Props provided by studio, optional costumes allowed.

description: Ensure your pet receives a full winter health assessment with our Winter Vet Health Checkup at FurLife Veterinary Clinic. This service includes temperature monitoring, joint inspections, respiratory evaluations, and a complete physical examination. Our veterinarians check for winter-related illnesses, advise on preventive care, and create a personalized care plan. Follow-up consultations are included for any abnormalities detected, ensuring your pet remains healthy, active, and safe throughout the season. Ideal for pets of all ages, this checkup promotes wellness and peace of mind for pet owners.
additionalNotes: Follow-up consultation included if abnormalities detected.
